chapter.title: Credential service client installation
chapter.para: This chapter explains how to download, build and install the credential service command line client. The software is java written and requires a java installation.

section.title: Credential service client build
section.screen: cd $MY_WORKING_DIR/cdp/cadc-cdp gradle build cd build/distributions/ tar -xvf cadc-cdp-x.y.z.tar

section.title: Credential service client install and configuration
section.para: Check the CLASSPATH variable set in $MY_WORKING_DIR/build/distributions/cadc-cdp-x.y.z/bin/cadc-cdp
